summary: this mod adds a cheat code to the gae that gives you.....
descriptionHtml:
this mod adds the cheat code \"toogle ultimate cheat\" or  \"tuc\" to the game.

this cheat will give you:
       
       * lvl 81
       * lvl 100 in all skills.
       * all preks.
       * high weapon speed. 
       * 99999999999999999 carryweight.
       * all spells.
       * all powers.
       * all shouts.
       * all mapmarkers.
       * a lot of stanima and health.
       * unlimited magika.
       * all you need for crafting and some grand soul gems.

to activate press \"~\" to open comand box.
then type \"bat tuc\".

ENJOY!
author: willern
